segments.text: Over on the left, there's a boy attempting to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Heâ€™s standing on a small, two-step stool placed on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable; its legs are splayed outwards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It appears to be tilting backward, almost ready to tip over at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching his body upwards, one hand already in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: With his other hand, he's holding a plate, perhaps to catch the stolen cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar itself is large and clearly labeled inside the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can only imagine the crash if that stool finally gives way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a precarious position for such a young child to be in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His focus is entirely on those cookies, oblivious to the danger beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope he manages to get a cookie before he takes a tumble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is making me quite anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR
